scripts.add-publish-submodule-SAMPLE: echo --Add .publish submodule-- && ( test ! -d .publish || git rm -f .publish ) && git submodule add -f git@github.com:lilliputten/django-test-1902-build.git .publish
scripts.add-dev-data-submodule-SAMPLE: echo --Add .dev-data submodule-- && ( test ! -d .dev-data || git rm -rf .dev-data ) && git submodule add -f git@github.com:lilliputten/django-test-1902-dev-data.git .dev-data
scripts.add-templates-submodule-SAMPLE: echo --Add .bem/templates submodule-- && ( test ! -d .bem/templates || git rm -rf .bem/templates ) && git submodule add -f git@github.com:lilliputten/bem-templates-react-ts-v1.git .bem/templates
scripts.postinstall-SAMPLE: echo --Run postinstall tasks-- && npm-run-all install-patches add-templates-submodule add-dev-data-submodule add-publish-submodule
scripts.help: echo --List all available script commands-- && npm-package-user-scripts-list
